articles.author: Erika Edwards, Kaan Ozcan
articles.title: Flu season is just beginning, but doctors are already on high alert - NBC News
articles.description: The flu has started spreading earlier than usual in some parts of the country, prompting concerns that cases could soon erupt as millions of Americans travel and gather for Thanksgiving and other upcoming holidays
